thread.title: How the watery liquid floating on top of your yoghurt is perfectly safe to eat… and is even good for you
thread.title_full: How the watery liquid floating on top of your yoghurt is perfectly safe to eat… and is even good for you

author: jnewton
title: How the watery liquid floating on top of your yoghurt is perfectly safe to eat… and is even good for you
text:
Mrs Crunch Don't bin it How the watery liquid floating on top of your yoghurt is perfectly safe to eat… and is even good for you 
Experts say that rather than throwing the yoghurt away or getting rid of the liquid, it should be stirred in Revealed
